column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Marcela - Thank you for your review. Our Tonkotsu White features pork and chicken broth
column2: and at present we do not offer any form of beef broth at any of our locations (yet). Regardless
column3: I'm sorry you did not enjoy your ramen. Please know that if you're ever unhappy with any of our dishes for any reason
column4: to inform your server who will gladly remake the bowl or suggest an alternative. Thanks again for your visit.
